Gang patch ban: Police to coordinate gang liaison efforts in preparation for new law https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/gang-patch-ban-police-to-cooperative-gang-liaison-efforts-in-preparation-for-new-law/KA5DBHKQRBDJJGJRID6PTDCFEM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/gang-patch-ban-police-to-cooperative-gang-liaison-efforts-in-preparation-for-new-law/KA5DBHKQRBDJJGJRID6PTDCFEM/ Adam PearseThe Justice Minister accepts the ban will be a challenge to implement. Maui Milk sheep milk: Waikato suppliers told stop milking as China market dries up https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/maui-milk-sheep-milk-waikato-suppliers-told-stop-milking-as-china-market-dries-up/M7RVJHRSNNHS5LYY5F7VLOATZ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/maui-milk-sheep-milk-waikato-suppliers-told-stop-milking-as-china-market-dries-up/M7RVJHRSNNHS5LYY5F7VLOATZ4/ Maui Milk emailed its 13 Waikato suppliers on Monday afternoon telling them to stop. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 03:48:10 +0000 Maui Milk says an imbalance between supply and demand for New Zealand sheep dairy products has caused it to tell its Waikato suppliers to stop milking.
